short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View links for Hangouts Chat threads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Chrome Extension to view links for Hangouts Chat (G-Suite). Attaches a link icon at the top right side of each thread below the follow button, which on clicking navigates to that thread.
